P5 JS projects

I'm not the greatest fan of JavaScript, but I have to admit that P5 JS is fun to play with. I used to have a lot of fun with it back in 2022, when I was in my first Computer Science year. Well, I've stopped for a while, but (since it's a dependence for this website :P) I'm planning to get back to it in my free time.
